p: Orange peel essential oil was reported to inhibit completely the growth of inoculated S. aureus in Sardina pilchardus from the second day till the end of the storage period with additional antioxidant activity required to suppress sardine rancidity. Such dual effects pose the oil to be used as a potent natural preservative with the ability of reducing lipid oxidation in sardines as well as protecting against the growth of common food-borne pathogens [ 49, 157].
